item.title: Road signs blocking the road., 17th July
item.description:
At the roundabout at the junction of High Street Prestbury and Southam Road. There are previous outstanding reports of similar blockages but relating to a different closed road in Winchcombe. The latest ones were seen being placed by contractors at about 18:30 Wed 16 July. They were positioned within 10 yards of the roundabout (on Southam Rd) and completely blocking the left hand lane so as to cause traffic to give way to traffic coming into Prestbury/ proceed with caution. They warn that the B4632 Broadway Road is closed 5 miles ahead and sign a diversion. There are two further such notices along Southam Road, at Shaw Lane and New Road turnings. These latter do not obstruct the road. The current positioning is dangerous and likely to lead to an accident. Have you informed the police of the positioning in advance, and gained their approval? Or are you happy to bear the cost of accident claims? If signs MUST be placed at the junction kindly ensure they DO NOT obstruct the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southam Road, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Green filter arrow not working, 17th July
item.description:
Left filter green light onto upper promenade/montpellier from town hall direction not working at about 1440 today 17 July 2025. Waited through entire light cycle and into the next one with traffic queuing and honking behind me.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 118, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Excessively Long Verge Grass (ALL of Bishops Cleeve), 17th July
item.description:
This is a general observation for the whole of Bishops Cleeve. The road verges in the entire village have excessively long grass that has not been cut for some months. It looks terrible. While appreciating the new policy on biodiversity, the lack of attention has gone well beyond the policy and is ruining the appearance of the village.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Britannia Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds growing on council land next to my house., 17th July
item.description:
Hi I am regularly getting complaints from this person at 5 Canning Road (see email below). Can you please confirm you have added this area to your schedule and when are you due to attend the weeds. Linda Hi Linda, I've contacted you in the past with regards to weeds growing on council land next to my house. They came and removed, although it needs doing again please. They come and mow the grass but never clear the weeds, I have to keep contacting yourself. Can we get them to clear the weeds the same time they do the grass at all? The neighbours keep moaning at me! Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canning Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 17th July
item.description:
